The Christians triumph over death a sermon at the funeral of Richard Legh of Lime in the county Palatine of Chester, Esq., at Winwick in the county Palatine of Lancaster Sept. 6. 1687 / W. Shippen ... Shippen, W. (William), 1637?-1693.

Printed at the theater, Oxford : 1688.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Dedicatory page signed: W.S.
